dict.acceptation: 色拉；（或生或熟，多拌有蛋黄酱，与面食、豆类等一起食用的）蔬菜色拉；（拌有肉、鱼、奶酪等的）混合色拉；拌色拉的青菜（尤指生菜）；

sent.orig: Chef's Salad, Mixed Salad and Shrimp Salad.
sent.trans: 有主厨沙拉，混合沙拉和鲜虾沙拉。

sent.orig: Mixed Salad, Seafood Salad and Gourmandize Salad.
sent.trans: 综合沙拉，海鲜沙拉和美食沙拉。

sent.orig: C:I want to have this waldorf salad instead of the Caesar salad.
sent.trans: 我想吃这种华尔道夫色拉而不要凯撒色拉。

sent.orig: Salad Ice Cream: An ice cream salad that definitely needs to be tossed.
sent.trans: 沙拉冰激凌：这份沙拉冰激凌实在不应该摆上桌面。

sent.orig: Divide the leaves between 4 salad plates and top with the dressed prawn salad.
sent.trans: 将绿叶蔬菜分入4个色拉盘中。将调味过的虾仁色拉置于蔬菜上。
